plot: A romantic (silent) musical with a sci-fi twist, Coconut Shy is a sweet & heartbreaking homage to the Hollywood Dance Movies of the 1930's and 1940's.
title: Coconut Shy
plot_es: A romantic (silent) musical with a sci-fi twist, Coconut Shy is a sweet & heartbreaking homage to the Hollywood Dance Movies of the 1930's and 1940's.
plot_en: A romantic (silent) musical with a sci-fi twist, Coconut Shy is a sweet & heartbreaking homage to the Hollywood Dance Movies of the 1930's and 1940's.
